remarks:
Extract the first member of an ordered pair.  Theorem 73 of [Suppes] p. 42.  (See ~ op2ndb to extract the second member, ~ op1sta for an alternate version, and ~ op1st for the preferred version.)  (Contributed by NM, 25-Nov-2003.)

statement:
op1stb.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
op1stb.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
op1stb $p |- |^| |^| <. A , B >. = A $.
